cooling: Neu ban dang root mot Air Unit - dac biet la Air Unit Lite (Caddx Vista) - hay dam bao rang no duoc lam mat tich cuc bang cach huong quat vao no.
disclaimerTitle: Tuyen bo tu choi trach nhiem:
disclaimerLine1: Dam bao rang thiet bi can root duoc cap nguon tu nguon dien dang tin cay
disclaimerLine2: Chi co mot thiet bi duoc ket noi / ghep noi
disclaimerLine3: Khong tat nguon trong qua trinh root
disclaimerLine4: Tiep tuc voi rui ro cua rieng ban
